content: Yes, social media can definitely have a big impact on the popularity of a song. With platforms like TikTok and Instagram, songs can quickly go viral and gain widespread recognition. This can lead to increased radio airplay and streaming numbers, which in turn can propel a song up the charts. In some cases, a song might even become a hit solely because of its popularity on social media. So it's definitely becoming increasingly important for artists and labels to have a strong social media presence in order to promote and market their music effectively.
